member.name: F:BaGetter.Database.SqlServer.SqlServerContext.UniqueConstraintViolationErrorCode
member.summary: The SQL Server error code for when a unique constraint is violated.

member.name: M:BaGetter.Database.SqlServer.SqlServerContext.IsUniqueConstraintViolationException(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbUpdateException)
member.summary: Check whether a is due to a SQL unique constraint violation.
member.returns: Whether the exception was caused to SQL unique constraint violation.
